block_comment: This block is a signal assignment operation in Verilog RTL code. It assigns the value of "scan_done_r" to the signal "scan_done". This is a simple one-liner Verilog code that is commonly used in design and test verification flows where "scan_done_r" might represent the status of a certain scan operation and "scan_done" could be the signal used by other parts of the system to denote the completion of the scan.
